other_tests.findings: Cervical VEMP thresholds of 65 dB in most cases, with elevated SP:AP ratios indicating possible canal dehiscence.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Testing obtained 3 months after surgery in Patient A-1 showed normalization of the cervical VEMP and SP:AP ratio for the ear undergoing surgery.

other_tests.findings: SP:AP ratio noted to be abnormal in several patients, particularly in those with SCDS.
Radiographic dehiscence of bone over the superior semicircular canal at the arcuate eminence bilaterally in many patients.
